Day 1 (March 6th): Richmond to Houston

* Fly from Richmond to Houston (Flight Number F4041372, Departure Time: 08:27 AM, Arrival Time: 10:43 AM, Duration: 3 hours 16 minutes)
* Check-in at a hotel in the city center, such as the Hyatt Regency Houston or the Four Seasons Hotel Houston (approximate cost: $200-$500 per night)
* Lunch at a nearby Chinese restaurant, such as the Peking Cuisine Restaurant (approximate cost: $15-$30 per person)
* Visit the Museum of Fine Arts, Houston (approximate cost: $20-$30 per person)
* Dinner at an Indian restaurant, such as the Indika Restaurant (approximate cost: $25-$40 per person)

Day 2 (March 7th): Houston

* Breakfast at a local café or bakery (approximate cost: $10-$20 per person)
* Visit the Space Center Houston (approximate cost: $25-$35 per person)
* Lunch at a nearby Tex-Mex restaurant, such as the Ninfa's on Navigation (approximate cost: $15-$30 per person)
* Visit the Houston Arboretum and Nature Center (free admission)
* Dinner at a seafood restaurant, such as the Grotto Restaurant (approximate cost: $30-$50 per person)

Day 3 (March 8th): Houston to Texarkana

* Fly from Houston to Texarkana (Flight Number F3930024, Departure Time: 17:56 PM, Arrival Time: 19:00 PM, Duration: 1 hour 4 minutes)
* Check-in at a hotel in the city center, such as the Hampton Inn Texarkana (approximate cost: $100-$200 per night)
* Lunch at a nearby Chinese restaurant, such as the Wok This Way (approximate cost: $15-$30 per person)
* Visit the Texarkana Museum of Regional History (free admission)
* Dinner at an Indian restaurant, such as the Taste of India (approximate cost: $25-$40 per person)

Day 4 (March 9th): Texarkana

* Breakfast at a local café or bakery (approximate cost: $10-$20 per person)
* Visit the Texarkana Nature Center (free admission)
* Lunch at a nearby Southern restaurant, such as the Honeycomb Restaurant (approximate cost: $15-$30 per person)
* Visit the Ace of Clubs House (free admission)
* Dinner at a steakhouse restaurant, such as the Outback Steakhouse (approximate cost: $30-$50 per person)

Day 5 (March 10th): Texarkana to Richmond

* Fly from Texarkana to Richmond (Flight Number F4041372, Departure Time: 19:00 PM, Arrival Time: 22:16 PM, Duration: 3 hours 16 minutes)
* Approximate total cost for the 5-day trip: $5,980-$6,480

Note: The costs listed are approximate and can vary based on individual preferences and exchange rates. The itinerary can be adjusted to fit your specific interests and budget.
